alert.note: Alert for Dundy; Hitchcock; Red Willow (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 23 at 5:28PM CST until January 24 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST /NOON CST/ WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in association with dense fog. * WHERE...Entire Tri-State area. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST /noon CST/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Near steady temperatures ranging from 28 to 32 degrees are expected this evening and overnight. Snow melt on sidewalks, parking lots and area roads may refreeze into black ice.
info.instruction: Drivers are urged to slow down and exercise additional caution, especially at intersections and highway onramps and offramps where accidents are more likely to occur. Use low beam headlights and be prepared for rapid reductions in visibility.
